```{r}
# read in geohub ecoregions data

library(terra)
library(sf)

ecoregions_shp <- st_read("../ecoregion.shp")
ecoregions_shp

names(ecoregions_shp)

#view data and see that we want to isolate the column "ECO" to 1A and 1B (for coastal regions)
```
```{r}
# doing this in lab 
oba

sf_objects <- st_as_sf(oba,
                      coords = c("decimalLongitude", "decimalLatitude"),
                      crs = WGS84)

# use crs = WGS84 because it most common CRS for long/lat data (used in GPS, Google Maps, etc.)
```
```{r}

eco_vect <- vect(ecoregions_shp)
r <- rast(ext(eco_vect), resolution =  1000) 
raster_output <- rasterize(ecoregions_shp, r, field = "ECO")

plot(raster_output)
```
